query.title: Search Query
query.description: Search term or keywords to find products (e.g., 'skincare', 'wireless headphones', 'fitness gear')

limit.title: Maximum Results
limit.description: Maximum number of products to return (default: 50, max: 200)

includeDetails.title: Include Detailed Analytics
includeDetails.description: Include comprehensive market analysis and business metrics

minTrendingScore.title: Minimum Trending Score
minTrendingScore.description: Filter products with trending score above this value (0-100)

minUnitsSold.title: Minimum Units Sold
minUnitsSold.description: Filter products with at least this many units sold

maxRetries.title: Maximum Retry Attempts
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests

delayBetweenRequests.title: Delay Between Requests (ms)
delayBetweenRequests.description: Delay in milliseconds between API requests
